The guidelines were not published on the: s top medical research body, the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR).
Dr: Rajni Kant, the head of Research Management, Policy, Planning and Coordination at ICMR, confirmed that the guidelines were fake news and that ICMR had not issued any such guideline.
The number of confirmed COVID: 19 cases and deaths in India provided by the World Health Organization was mentioned as additional context.
